A [[regular polygon|regular]] octagon is a closed figure with sides of the same length and internal angles of the same size. It has eight lines of [[reflective symmetry]] and [[rotational symmetry]] of order 8.
The internal [[angle]] at each vertex of a regular octagon is 135[[degree (angle)|Â°]] and the sum of all the internal angles is 1080Â° (as for any octagon).
